author: meyerc13
title: My favorite mini-vehicle!
review:
Several times a year LEGO releases these mini-vehicles, both in the Creator line and also in the Racers line.  I always look forward to seeing what the next wave brings us, because at $5-6 these are a little bundle of LEGO happiness to brighten up my day.  Generally I build them, admire the model, and then strip it for parts for my kids' LEGO City.

This set however has really sparked my imagination.  This little articulated loader has all of the playability of the 7630 Front-End Loader in a fraction of the size.  I won't spoil the surprise, but the technique used to create the articulation is genius.  I'll give you a hint, it doesn't use a hinge piece!

As for the parts, probably the most interesting is the Mudguard 2x4 with Headlight Overhang in Yellow.  This is a useful part for making quad bikes as we've seen in the Coast Guard and City Police lines.

This is a phenomenal set, and is certain to spark the imagination of even builders like me who prefer to work in minfig scale.  I'd highly recommend this set, because the parts are great, the design is incredible, and it's lots of fun to drive it around and test the articulation!

author: Ernst
title: Mini Digger, Tow Truck, 4x4 Buggy, small cars but great set.
review:
Overall 5 bricks: another "great" small Creator set with 3 lovely vehicles and some nice parts. Like most small Creator sets sold in the plastic box in which you can save it when you parted it. Sold for a price everyone can afford, so a big 5 bricks again. I start to like these smal Creator sets more and more.

 

Building 4 bricks: Building is not too difficult but still asks some attention because of all the small parts, probably the reason why LEGO starts with an age of 6 years.

 

  • First the Small Digger, you start with the front part which you connect to the very goodlooking rear part. You connect them with a small hook which when finished allows the digger to turn, very stable thanks to the supportplates. You end with building a very good looking shovel. Result looks and works great!
  • Second the small Tow Truck, also looks nice because thanks to the mudguard and I like the 2 exhaustpipes on the sides. The towing device looks great too.
  •                                                                                                                                Third the 4x4 Buggy: my personal favorite of the 3 vehicles. Simply because how it looks and how the parts are used, the 2 robotarms on the sides, the yellow searchlights and the red tail-lights and the black slopes on the hood make it look great!

 

Parts 5 bricks: I already mentioned several parts in this set like the mudguard and the robotarms. Also very good parts are the black slopes with slots, the big wheels, the yellow plates with holes, the plates with doorrails and so on. Very good !!

 

Playabilty 5 bricks: 3 great cars that are all three great to built and play with, 5 BIG BRICKS here.

 

Value 5 bricks: all the great fun I mentioned before, the great parts, plastic box and all this for the small amount of no more than €4,99 is a great deal.

author: glaubercavassani
title: Em mini escala, um formidável set de cores contrastantes
review: O que mais chama a atenção deste pequeno mas formidável set é pelo fato de suas cores constrastantes e pela pela representação com a escala proposta. Sem dúvida, é sempre um dos prediletos de quem o adquire. Sua montagem é divertida e a conclusão, surpreendedora.
